summary: A small but cosy home perfect for the adventurer. Complete with a spa and full crafting area.
descriptionHtml:
[center] [color=#0080FF][size=6] Creeks - A player Home [/size] [/color] [/center]
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/1884294-1342790672.png[/img][/center]

Whilst playing Skyrim for some time now and after trying various house mods i decided that there was nothing that quite satisfied. Being a rookie to the creation kit in general i started out with Drellas\' cottage which had always interested me. Thus, i worked on creating a overhaul of the cottage starting from scratch and building up something i can say im proud of. 

[size=5] [color=Green] Features: [/size] [/color]
[list]
[*] Riverside location and stunning views of the surrounding mountains and waterfall
[*] Full outdoor crafting area
[*] Nearby access to gold ore veins and a re spawning cave system
[*] Interior includes weapon racks, display cases and plenty of storage with future updates to add mannequins ect...
[*] Plans for a possible basement (?)
[*] Appropriately cluttered and furnished
[/list]

[center]June 20th
[b] [color=Green] ****************** [size=5] Update 1[/size] ***************** [/color][/b]
[img=right]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/1884294-1342264923.jpg [/img][/center]Included features:
[list]
[*] Added serene outdoor spa area perfect for some R&R after a hard day on the job.
[*] Enjoy mountainous views whilst knocking back a cold one and chilling out in your very own private natural hot pool.
[*]  Sheltered area with stairs leading up from the crafting area.
[/list]


[center]June 22nd
[b] [color=Green] ****************** [size=5] Update 2 [/size] ***************** [/color][/b] [/center]

[img=right]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/1884294-1342264957.jpg [/img]Included features:
[list]
[*] New interior update based on recommendations left in the comments!
[*] Interior update with mannequins weapon plaques and more storage!
[*] Added two usable book cases to create a small library.
[*] Safes and strongboxes for those important goodies
[/list]
Enjoy!

And before updating, you must remove any weapons or other items from the chests in the display area and display case or you risk loosing them forever! 

You have been warned.


[center]July 14th
[b] [color=Green] ****************** [size=5] Update 3 [/size] ***************** [/color][/b] [/center]

[img=right]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/1884294-1342264988.jpg [/img]Included features:
[list]
[*] New outdoor crafting area that (imo) suits better which is less cluttered, less overgrown with grass and more economical to the casual blacksmith.
[*] Toned down some of the clutter on the dining table and added removable items.
[*] Forge now resides within a rock face where the previous owner of the property carved out a great furnace from the rock.
[*] Work on upgrading and crafting whilst surrounded in the natural tranquility of the nearby watercourse.
[/list]


[center]July 16th
[b] [color=Green] ****************** [size=5] Update 4 [/size] ***************** [/color][/b] [/center]
Small update
[list]
[*] small bug fixes
[*] Added new scripted outdoor lighting that (should) turn off during the day
[*] Added addition labelled chests around the crafting area for additional sorting options
[/list] 


[center]July 20th
[b] [color=Green] ****************** [size=5] Update 5 [/size] ***************** [/color][/b] [/center]

[img=right]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/1884294-1342784969.jpg [/img]Included features:
[list]
[*] Complete overhaul of the enchanting, alchemy and study areas
[*] New bar area upstairs to chill-out and relax
[*] New storage for soul gems and potions
[*] Added wood chopping block outside and wood storage
[/list] 

More updates to come and if you want anything added , suggest idea in the comments and i will consider it thoroughly!


[center][b]Located east of Whiterun and next to the Darkshade cave system. (see map in images)[/b][/center]

[center][b][color=red][size=5]Installation[/size] [/color][/b][/center]

Installation now includes a bsa file as small scripts are now involved.

[b][size=4]Automatic Download with NMM[/size][/b]
[list]
[*] Click the [color=#7cbeff]Download with manager[/color] button on top of the file.

[*] Creeks will appear in in NMM\'s [color=#7cbeff]Mods[/color] list once it\'s downloaded. Double-click the [color=#7cbeff]Creeks[/color] entry to activate it.
[/list]

[b][size=4]Manual Installation without NMM[/size][/b]
[list]
[*] Locate the [color=#7cbeff]Data/[/color] folder in your Skyrim installation directory. Usually found at [color=yellow]Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/[/color].
[*] Extract the Creeks archive file to your [color=#7cbeff]Data/[/color] folder. Overwrite any previous version of Creeks.
[*] Activate Creeks in the data files option on the Skyrim Launcher.
[/list]

Feedback is strongly welcome and dont forget to endorse/rate if you want
Cheers,

File credits
-Inspiration from various other house mods
-Big thanks to Blary\'s Booksets, and openbooks
-Additional credits to Oaristys and Tony67 for their Modders Resource Pack 
Be sure to check them out if you are planning on making a house.
author: Cybermoses23

files.name: Creeks- A playerhome v2
files.changelogHtml: added outdoor hot spa to the house

files.changelogHtml:
added more chests in crafting area
scripted outdoor lights
